markdownRemark.html: Marbella Beauty Academy is located close to the world famous Puerto Banus in southern Spain. The academy offers a globally recognized certification in beauty therapy and holistic courses. In 2018 they launched a new school and their own Hush Beauty Studio in Sotogrande Port, just 25 minutes from Gibraltar Airport and 1 hour from Malaga Airport. Full and part time courses in Beauty Therapy, Make-up, Hairdressing and Nails.
